text: aur haqeeqat amr ye hai ki yahee log jhoothe hain us shakhs ke siva jo (kalamae kuphr) par majaboor kiya jae aur usaka dil eemaan kee taraph se mutamin ho jo shakhs bhee eemaan laane ke baad kuphr ekhtiyaar kare balki khoob seena kushaada (jee kholakar) kuphr kare to un par khuda ka gazab hai aur unake lie bada (sakht) azaab hai
